H0.text: Hibernation and migration are the two processes that occur during the life spans of all animals.

H1.text: Growth and development are the two processes that occur during the life spans of all animals.

H2.text: Changing color and shedding fur are two processes that occur during the life spans of all animals.

H3.text: Building nests and communication are the two processes that occur during the life spans of all animals.

A4.text: Developmental biology is the scientific study of the processes by which animals and plants grow and develop.

A5.text: Growth in embryos is mostly autonomous. For each territory of cells the growth rate is controlled by the combination of genes that are active.
